statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT timestamp, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 101
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50
SELECT timestamp, metric_name FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'packet%'
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'latency%' AND metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT timestamp, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY timestamp HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT device_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name IN ('ping', 'packet_loss') GROUP BY device_id
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, COUNT(id) AS count FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY device_id HAVING count > 5 ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM network_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, metric_name FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM network_metrics;
SELECT id, metric_name, timestamp FROM network_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT metric_name, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM network_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING max_value > 500;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value AS value, timestamp FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU_Utilization' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT id, metric_name, ROUND(metric_value, 2) AS rounded_value, timestamp FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%throughput%' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM network_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND metric_name LIKE '%errors%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Network' AND detection_timestamp >= '2021-07-01' ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM network_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_events WHERE severity = 'high' AND device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id;
SELECT device_name, timestamp, description, severity FROM network_devices INNER JOIN anomaly_events ON network_devices.device_id = anomaly_events.device_id WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS total_metrics FROM network_metrics GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(metric_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM network_devices
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices
SELECT ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center'
SELECT * FROM metrics_data
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM metrics_data WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, location FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE 'Building%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY device_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_location = 'Server Room';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_metrics ORDER BY metric_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT log_level, log_message FROM troubleshooting_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_location = 'Server Room';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT DISTINCT device_location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_location DESC;
SELECT device_name, metric_name, metric_timestamp, metric_value FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id ORDER BY metric_timestamp ASC;
